title: Things I helped to make
description: A collection of projects I've worked on

projects.title: ILO Live
projects.description: The livestream event platform of the International Labour Organization, hosting around 200 official meetings and events every year, including the annual International Labour Conference.

projects.title: ILO Design System
projects.description: The official Design System of the International Labour Organization, a collection of reusable components, patterns and guidelines for building websites and web applications. Available for both Drupal and React.

projects.title: ILO Voices
projects.description: A digital storytelling platform about working people and their lives. Also home of the 'Future of Work' podcast.

projects.title: ILO Centenary Website
projects.description: An interactive journey through the past, present and future of the International Labour Organization, built to commemorate the organization's 100th anniversary in 2019.
